awards:
第53届柏林国际电影节(2003)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片(提名) Stepan Koval
　　银熊奖 最佳短片
introduction: A humorous snippet of everyday life in a Ukrainian city enacted by passengers from all walks of life stuffed into a packed streetcar.Awards:- Molodist International Film Festival (2002) - Audience Award- Krok International Animated Films Festival (2002) - Grand Prix- FIKE - Évora International Short Film Festival (2002) - Best Animation (Special Mention)- Fantoche - International Animation Film Festival (2003) - Audience Award- Cracow Film Festival (2003) - Silver Dragon (Best Animated Film)- Bilbao International Festival of Documentary and Short Films (2003) - Golden Mikeldi- Berlin International Film Festival (2003) - Silver Berlin Bear (Best Short Film)
